messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] letters to trace
messages.msgSnippet: ... That was such a good idea. Rhodri wanted me to do a s and y s for him cos he has trouble with those. I did several pages and he s having a wonderful time
messages.messageBody:
On 21 Nov 02, at 15:14, SandraDodd@... wrote:

> Could you just find a clear font on the computer, make it big, make it
> really light (either gray or yellow) and the print it out for kids to
> trace?
>
That was such a good idea. Rhodri wanted me to do a's and y's for
him cos he has trouble with those. I did several pages and he's
having a wonderful time :-)

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] letters to trace
messages.msgSnippet: Could you just find a clear font on the computer, make it big, make it really light (either gray or yellow) and the print it out for kids to trace?
messages.messageBody:
Could you just find a clear font on the computer, make it big, make it really
light (either gray or yellow) and the print it out for kids to trace?

messages.subject: letters to trace
messages.msgSnippet: Shyrley-- You can print up your own pages here: http://www.weewebbies.com/htmls/web35190.htm Or download a font from here, or follow a link to create your own
messages.messageBody:
Shyrley--
You can print up your own pages here:
http://www.weewebbies.com/htmls/web35190.htm

Or download a font from here, or follow a link to create your own practice
page.
<A HREF="http://www.fortunecity.com/skyscraper/dos/1232/page01.html">The Teachers' Parking Lot - Fonts for Teachers-Penmanship Fonts</A>

Mary J
